snippet.title: Audit and fix UI issues in Android Studio
snippet.description:
"Fix all UI check issues" in Android Studio reviews common UI concerns like contrast in dark mode and light mode, button colors, button changes across form factors, padding, and more. Agent Mode validates and refines the resulting UI, helping you ship with confidence. 


Watch more What's New In Android Studio → https://goo.gle/AndroidStudio-Tools         
Subscribe to Android Developers → https://goo.gle/AndroidDevs

#AndroidStudio #AndroidDevelopers

Speaker: Sandhya Mohan
Products Mentioned: Android Studio
tags: Series: What's New In Android Studio;

snippet.title: Debugging R8 in Android Studio Otter
snippet.description:
Debugging R8 minified code just became seamless! Logcat now automatically detects and retraces R8 process stack traces. 

Download Android Studio  → https://developer.android.com/studio

snippet.title: 3 Google Play tools every Dev needs
snippet.description:
Stop guessing and start growing. These 3 Google Play Console features solve your biggest launch headaches:
       Pre-Launch Reports: Catch bugs before users do.
       Translation Services: Go global instantly.
       Android Vitals: Real-time fix for app performance.

Level up your dev workflow today!

snippet.title: What is android studio's "Fix UI" AI feature and how to use it
snippet.description:
Explore how the "Fix UI" feature in Android Studio leverages AI to make your applications more adaptive and accessible. This video shows the steps: from activating the feature in the Compose preview panel to implementing suggested code changes. Try it out yourself to see how this AI tool helps you identify and resolve subtle UI issues that can be easy to miss.

Download Android Studio  → https://goo.gle/402ImQA 
Checkout the new UI AI features →  https://goo.gle/studio-agent-compose
File feedback and bugs →  https://goo.gle/studio-file-bug
Subscribe to Android Developers → https://goo.gle/AndroidDevs 

#AndroidStudio AndroidDeveloper #JetpackCompose

Speaker: Simona Milanovic
Products Mentioned: Android, Android Studio, Jetpack Compose,
